tools.name: lint_agents
tools.description: Validates agent directories, birth logs, and referenced artifact folders.

tools.name: check_avatars
tools.description: Ensures all avatar PNGs exist with valid headers per gallery.

tools.name: link-shared-workspace
tools.description: Symlinks shared identity stack into target workspace.

tools.name: generate-avatar
tools.description: CLI wrapper over dependency-free avatar generator.

tools.name: hummbl-inventory
tools.description: Placeholder inventory script; guarded to require HUMMBL_REMOTE before running.

tools.name: hummbl-sync
tools.description: Placeholder sync script requiring HUMMBL_SYNC_TARGET env var.

tools.name: generate_agent_registry
tools.description: Parses IDENTITY.md files and produces registries/agents.json.

tools.name: agent_lookup
tools.description: Reads registries/agents.json and prints agent/team details by callsign.
